code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Upload}from'react-feather';import'../styles/ImportForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ImportUsers=()=>{const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[isUploading,setIsUploading]=useState(false);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleFileChange=event=>{setFile(event.target.files[0]);setMessage('');};const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();if(!file){setMessage('Por favor, selecciona un archivo primero.');return;}setIsUploading(true);const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file);try{const apiUrl=process.env.URL_BACKEND||'http://localhost:3001';const response=await fetch(`${apiUrl}/users/import`,{method:'POST',body:formData,headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}`}});if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();setMessage(`Usuarios importados exitosamente: ${data.importedCount}`);}else{setMessage('Error al importar usuarios: '+response.statusText);}}catch(error){setMessage('Error al importar usuarios: '+error.message);}finally{setIsUploading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"import-users",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Import Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"file-input-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:handleFileChange,id:"file-upload",className:"file-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{htmlFor:"file-upload",className:"file-label",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Upload,{size:20}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:file?file.name:'Seleccionar archivo'})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-button",disabled:isUploading,children:isUploading?'Importando...':'Importar Usuarios'})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"message",children:message})]});};export default ImportUsers;
